mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION_TB WHERE CK_RES_ST != 'PROCESSING'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION_TB WHERE CK_RES_ST = 'PROCESSING'

SELECT RES.RES_CD AS NO, ACC.ACCOM_NAME, RES.RES_NAME, RES.RES_PHONE, RES.RES_EMAIL_ID, RES.CK_RES_ST FROM RESERVATION_TB RES LEFT JOIN ROOM_TB R ON (RES.ROOM_NO = R.ROOM_SQ) LEFT JOIN ACCOMMODATION_TB ACC ON (ACC.ACCOM_SQ = R.ACCOM_NO)
( RES.RES_CD LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR RES.RES_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR RES.RES_PHONE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' )
ORDER BY RES.RES_CD DESC

SELECT RES.RES_CD AS NO, P.RECEIPT_ID, RES.RES_NAME, P.PAY_PRICE, RES.CK_RES_ST FROM RESERVATION_TB RES LEFT JOIN ORDER_TB O ON (RES.RES_CD = O.RES_CD) LEFT JOIN PAYMENT_TB P ON (O.RECEIPT_ID = P.RECEIPT_ID)
RES.CK_RES_ST = 'PROCESSING'
AND ( RES.RES_CD LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR RES.RES_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR RES.RES_PHONE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' )
ORDER BY P.PAY_DT DESC, RES.RES_CD DESC

SELECT RES.RES_CD, RES.RES_NAME, RES.RES_PHONE, RES.RES_EMAIL_ID, ACC_TYPE.ACCOM_TYPE_NAME, ACC.ACCOM_NAME, R.ROOM_NAME, P.RECEIPT_ID, P.PAY_METHOD, P.PAY_PRICE, P.PAY_DT FROM RESERVATION_TB RES LEFT JOIN ROOM_TB R ON RES.ROOM_NO = R.ROOM_SQ LEFT JOIN ACCOMMODATION_TB ACC ON (R.ACCOM_NO = ACC.ACCOM_SQ) LEFT JOIN ACCOMMODATION_TYPE_TB ACC_TYPE ON (ACC.ACCOM_TYPE_NO = ACC_TYPE.ACCOM_TYPE_SQ) LEFT JOIN ORDER_TB O ON (RES.RES_CD = O.RES_CD) LEFT JOIN PAYMENT_TB P ON (O.RECEIPT_ID = P.RECEIPT_ID) WHERE RES.RES_CD = #{resCd}

SELECT O.RECEIPT_ID, RES.RES_CD, RES.RES_EMAIL_ID, RES.RES_NAME, RES.RES_PHONE, RES.RES_NUM_OF_PEO, RES.CHECK_IN_DT, RES.CHECK_OUT_DT, RES.RES_REG_DT, R.ROOM_NAME, ACC.ACCOM_NAME FROM RESERVATION_TB RES LEFT JOIN ROOM_TB R ON (RES.ROOM_NO = R.ROOM_SQ) LEFT JOIN ACCOMMODATION_TB ACC ON (R.ACCOM_NO = ACC.ACCOM_SQ) LEFT JOIN ORDER_TB O ON (RES.RES_CD = O.RES_CD) WHERE RES.RES_CD = #{resCd} AND RES.CK_RES_ST = 'PROCESSING'
